com.ebay.lightning.client.caller

Class RestAPICaller

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ebay.lightning.client.caller.RestAPICaller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServiceCaller

    public class RestAPICaller
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServiceCaller
    The REST API based implementation of ServiceCaller that communicates with the seeds through REST calls.
    Author:
    shashukla
    See Also:
    EmbeddedAPICaller

    • Method Detail

      • reserve

        public ReservationReceipt reserve(int forLoad,
                                  java.lang.String serviceHostIp)
        Description copied from interface: ServiceCaller
        Attempts to reserve task execution bandwidth on the seed
        Specified by:
        reserve in interface ServiceCaller
        Parameters:
        forLoad - load size of the request
        serviceHostIp - the seed
        Returns:
        reservation receipt for the requested bandwidth. The seed might return ACCEPTED, DENIED or BUSY based on the current work load size of the seed.

      • submit

        public boolean submit(LightningRequest request,
                      java.lang.String serviceHostIp)
        Description copied from interface: ServiceCaller
        Submits the request to the specific seed.
        Specified by:
        submit in interface ServiceCaller
        Parameters:
        request - the request with the reservation receipt and task list
        serviceHostIp - the seed that executes the request
        Returns:
        true if the submit operation is successful

      • pollResults

        public LightningResponse pollResults(java.lang.String sessionId,
                                     java.lang.String serviceHostIp,
                                     boolean pollDeltaOnly)
        Description copied from interface: ServiceCaller
        Get the result for the session id.
        Specified by:
        pollResults in interface ServiceCaller
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the session id submitted through ServiceCaller.submit(LightningRequest, String) method or returned by the ServiceCaller.reserve(int, String) method
        serviceHostIp - the seed
        pollDeltaOnly - get the complete or only the delta
        Returns:
        the result for the request corresponding to sessionId

      • getAuditReport

        public LightningRequestReport getAuditReport(java.lang.String sessionId,
                                             java.lang.String serviceHostIp)
        Description copied from interface: ServiceCaller
        Get the audit report for the request id in compressed format.
        Specified by:
        getAuditReport in interface ServiceCaller
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the session id submitted through ServiceCaller.submit(LightningRequest, String) method or returned by the ServiceCaller.reserve(int, String) method
        serviceHostIp - the seed
        Returns:
        the audit report for the session id in compressed format. Returns the consolidated report if the session id is not present in the seed
